'''Beta 1.2.13.10''' is the fourth beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.2.13]], released on March 16, 2018,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004165251-Minecraft-Beta-1-2-13-10-Xbox-One-Windows-10-Android-|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.2.13.10 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|date=March 16, 2018}}</ref> which fixes one bug.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed an issue that caused named entities to lose their names when opening a world in beta.</onlyinclude>
